snippet: Assailants suspected of being members of Al Qaeda entered the compound after a car bombing and gunned down civilians at a hospital inside.
abstract: Suspected Qaeda members carry out a two-pronged attack on Yemen's heavily guarded Defense Ministry headquarters in Sana, killing 52 people and wounding more than 160.

byline.original: By NASSER ARRABYEE and BEN HUBBARD
byline.contributor: Nasser Arrabyee reported from Sana, and Ben Hubbard from Beirut, Lebanon. Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Assailants suspected of being members of Al Qaeda entered the compound after a car bombing and gunned down civilians at a hospital inside.

headline.main: Assault on Yemeni Defense Ministry Compound Kills 52
headline.print_headline: Assault on Yemeni Defense Ministry Compound Kills 52

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations
